author: ekoneil
msg: Start the annotation processing support for Axis2.  This adds an Axis2 resource generator that can produce a services.xml file given annotated Java source files.
This change also fixes a handful of bugs in extending the annotation processors including resolution of a -AwsmResourceGenerator property passed to APT.

author: gnodet
msg: SM-503: servicemix-http provider should not add the inMessage content-type header to the response if a new content-type is generated (mime messages)
Patch provided by Renaud Bruyeron, thx !

author: knut
msg: - Implemented support for assembly instructions (<assembly>) inside <invoke-factory> element.
- Modified "object" translator to delegate to "smart" translator if colon separator is missing.

author: tmjee
msg: - added capability to add request parameter to redirect-action result
